'''Niquie''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] who lived during the [[Golden Age]].
document_data.History: Niquie developed a single [[spell]] during their life. Their breakthrough came in {{YearlinkConvert|2087|NY}}, when they developed the ''[[gaze reflection]]'' spell.
